pyutil.backup_nt_and_posix module¶

Backup a directory by appending the date and time and copying over.

Motivation¶

This script aims to be platform agnostic and in the long term will be used on Windows, Linux, Mac and Android systems.

Usage¶

python backup_nt_and_posix.py /path/to/dir
pyutil.backup_nt_and_posix.backup_directory(path)[source]¶

Create a backup of a directory. Use the date and time as new name.

Returns:means no error occurred. 0: to signify the success -1 : to signify the failure error string: the exact error string
Return type:None
